content: materials - 1 skein of purl soho s pepper 1 100% superwash merino wool each skein of this sport- to light worsted/dk-weight yarn is 218 yards/ 100 grams approximately 145 total yards required we used the colors black cherry candy apple eastern bluebird ferris wheel and pink apricot - us 4 3 5 mm 32-inch circular knitting needles 2 for magic loop 3 see notes - us 6 4 mm 32-inch circular needles for magic loop - a spare double pointed needle 4 us 6 or smaller - removable stitch markers 5 including 3 unique - poly-fil stuffing 6 gauge 40 stitches and 32 row = 4 inches in 1×1 rib on smaller needles 32 stitches and 60 rounds = 4 inches in textured slip_stitch pattern see notes on larger needles size - finished body circumference approximately 7¾ inches-8½ inches stuffed - finished length 14 inches magic loop because this pattern works a stitch pattern over a small circumference and requires picking up stitches along a curved edge we found it easiest to use 32-inch circular knitting needles and the magic loop technique however feel free to use double pointed needles for the whole thing if you prefer to learn how to use a magic loop visit our magic loop tutorial 7 … a simple way to knit small circumferences pattern designed and written by purl soho designer hiromi glover 8 see even more of hiromi s work on her instagram 9 1 https //www purlsoho com/pepper html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--circular_needles html 3 https //www purlsoho com/create/magic-loop/ 4 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--double_pointed_needles html 5 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--stitch_markers html 6 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--stuffing html 7 https //www purlsoho com/create/magic-loop/ 8 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/hiromi-glover-for-purl-soho/ 9 https //www instagram com/mignonnegrise/
